body.description: ♥HH Feminine Wash♥ ✔ Natural Formula For Female: add oats, chamomile, silver needle white tea and eliminates dullness, moisturizes, prevent roughness, firm, restores suppleness, and locks in moisture, tightening the skin.✔ Intimate Feminine Wash: Suitable for all skin types, including pregnant women.✔ pH Balanced: Added the lactic acid, yogurt, yeast, Leucidal Liquid, maintain a healthy intimate environment. Effectively relief of itching, excessive discharge, and any other uncomfortable symptoms, reducing the chance of infection.✔ Feminine Care Use: Refreshing Design, Relieves Sweat Discomfort. The special intimate cooling formula effectively relieves sweatiness and discomfort in your intimate area! Especially suitable during the period.✔ Natural Perfume by Essential Oil: 8-10 natural essential oil added✔ It is cruelty-free, alcohol-free, SLS/SLES-free and paraben-free.Flavors：Citrus Cool, Fresh Floral, Woody♥How to use♥Step1《HH Feminine Wash/Mousse》Apply the appropriate amount on your palm or bath sponge, and gently wash the intimate skin then rinse with clean water.Step2《HH Feminine Spray》Can be used anytime, lightly spray your intimate area, and no rinsing needed.Step3《HH Firming Serum》Use after a bath or before bed, apply an appropriate amount on the intimate skin and massage gently until completely absorbed♥HH Herb&Health♥HH Herb&Health is where herb and health collide.“Herb” is determined to use natural and environmental-friendly ingredients.“Health” excludes any ingredients that will harm our skin.★Selling over 100 thousand bottles all around Taiwan + Singapore + Malaysia + Philippine.♥Detail♥Capacity or weight：200ml (6.76 Ounce)Shelf Life：3 YearsOrigin：Taiwan
